alert.note: Alert for Benton; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 11:31PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Benton, west central Madison and northeastern Washington Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1130 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Farmington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Farmington... Elkins... Tontitown... Bethel Heights... Greenland... Hindsville... Wesley... War Eagle... Hobbs State Park... Drake Field Airport... Johnson... Goshen... Tuttle... Mayfield... Savoy... Wheeler... Sonora... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 59 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
